chinese: n.烤箱，炉，灶
english: oven

chinese: 这位女士喜欢在烤箱中烤面包。
english: The woman likes to bake bread in the oven

chinese: V.评论；复习；回顾 n.复习
english: review

chinese: 报纸上对这部名著做了评论。
english: The famous book was reviewed in the newspaper

chinese: at显然的，明白无误的，明了的v.使显现，使显露，表明
english: manifest

chinese: 观众能明显看出他的紧张。
english: His nervousness was manifest to all the audience

chinese: adj.感情丰富的；抒情诗调的
english: lyrical

chinese: 他满怀深情地称颂明月之美。
english: He waxed lyrical about the beauty of the moon

chinese: n.良心，良知
english: conscience

chinese: 我的良心经常告诉我要做对的事情。
english: My conscience always tells me to do something right

chinese: adj明智的
english: advisable

chinese: 如果你想保持健康，多吃蔬菜是明智的选择。
english: It's advisable to eat more vegetables if you want to keep fit

chinese: ad.不透水的，防水的 做防水处理 .防水物，防水材料，雨衣
english: waterproof

chinese: 幸运的是，这种鞋子是防水的。
english: Luckily, this kind of shoes are waterproof

chinese: N.胆固醇
english: cholesterol

chinese: 摄入过多的高脂肪食物会导致胆固醇阻塞血管。
english: Too many fatty foods will cause cholesterol to block your blood vessels

chinese: v 举止端正（或良好、恰当）
english: behave

chinese: 男孩的妈妈让他守规矩些，不要粗鲁。
english: The boy's mother asked him to behave himself and not be rude

chinese: adj.随机的；任意的 12.随意，胡乱
english: random

chinese: 这就是一系列随机的数字。
english: It's just a random series of numbers

chinese: V构成；包含，包括
english: comprise

chinese: 这些动物构成了猫科动物的大部分。
english: These animals comprise most of the cat family

chinese: 凶掠夺，洗劫 四掠夺品，赃物
english: loot

chinese: 一番掠夺之后，珠宝店里空空如也。
english: After the looting, there was nothing left in the jewelry store

chinese: n.交易
english: dealing

chinese: 交易成功后，他们都很满意。
english: They were both satisfied after the successful dealings

chinese: n.食肉动物
english: predator

chinese: 老虎、鹰和狼都是捕食者。
english: Tigers, eagles and wolves are all predators

chinese: ad）.（疾病）恶性的
english: malignant

chinese: 这是恶性肿瘤，我们必须切除它。
english: The tumor is malignant-we will have to remove it

chinese: ad），金钱的；货币的，金融的
english: monetary

chinese: 他很会理财，总是把钱存起来。
english: He was very good with monetary matters and always saved his money
